Te lo mando ahora mismo a tu dirección registrada que termina en @techcorp.com, junto con la confirmación de tu abono de cortesía mostrando el nuevo saldo de 42.500 puntos efectivo desde hoy.

original_conversation.content: I've been a member for three years and just discovered my points expired. I wasn't aware they had an expiration date.

I can see that here. Your account number LY-458923-K shows 28,000 points expired on October 31st after the standard 24-month activity period.
That's disappointing. Your website doesn't make this policy clear at all.
You're absolutely right that we need to improve our communication about this. The terms are currently on page 7 of our program guidelines, but I agree they should be more prominent.

I have good news. While I cannot restore expired points per our standard policy, I can offer you a one-time courtesy credit of 14,000 points, which is 50% of what expired.
